title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Display Technology Optimization Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic optical theory and foundational programming knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical training course combining optical simulation and reinforcement learning algorithms, centered on mini LED backlight module design

learning_goals: Learners acquire proficiency in LightTools/MATLAB-based optical simulation tools and can perform scattering characteristic analysis
Learners design reinforcement learning models using DDQN algorithms to optimize backlight module uniformity
Learners produce optimization reports on TiO2 diffusion layer thickness/concentration parameters based on simulation data

resources: Mini LED Backlight Design Case Dataset
Quantum Dot Film Optical Properties Document

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
